head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths JANBAZIAN, REV. MOVSES B.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths JANBAZIAN, REV. MOVSES B.

block.p: JANBAZIAN-Rev. Movses B., Executive Director of Armenian Missionary Association of America, Inc., Paramus, NJ on September 25, 2000. Husband of Louisa (nee Youmoushakian). Father of Vahak Boghos and Ani Agnes Janbazian. Son of Agnes (nee Andonian) and the late Boghos Janbazian. Brother of Marie Sarmazian, Vehanoush Sood, Sona Koujanian, Ani Hasserjian and Jack Janbazian. Religious service Saturday 11:00 AM, Armenian Presbyterian Church, 140 Forest Avenue, Paramus. For information, call Frank A. Patti & Kenneth Mikatarian Funeral Directors, Fort Lee, (201) 944-0100.

JANBAZIAN-Rev. Movses B., Executive Director of Armenian Missionary Association of America, Inc., Paramus, NJ on September 25, 2000. Husband of Louisa (nee Youmoushakian). For information, call Frank A. Patti & Kenneth Mikatarian Funeral Directors, Fort Lee, (201) 944-0100.
